title: Total Sales
description: Profit Ratio is calculated as total profit divided by total sales.

title: Avg Discount
description: Avg Discount reflects the average discount applied to sales.

title: Profit Ratio
description: Profit Ratio is calculated as total profit divided by total sales for a given period. It reflects how efficiently revenue is converted into profit.

title: Unique Customers
description: Unique Customers represents the number of distinct customers who made purchases during the selected time period. It indicates customer reach and engagement.
